A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While I loved the Force Awakens\, there was a lot there that was a rehash of things past. Nothing wrong with that\, I think it was needed at the time\, but I'm pleased to see that they went a different route with this one. I can understand that those fans who see the OT as pure Star Wars and will not accept anything that deviates from that may not like it so much\, however I personally found this refreshing\, with enough nods to the past that you could feel like it really was a Star Wars movie\, but with enough that was new and fresh that it feels like the beginning of a new era.  I can't wait to see what comes next.
